docs: We had a situation where housekeeping missed "cleaning" the room and left a "thing" behind from someone's party night. We were upset, but management took care of it ASAP. We got move to a different room (upgrade) and felt like we were cared for. Thank you Shawn and others who were sensitive to this "situation". For doing the right thing 5 stars and a great review. Older hotel but kept well. Travelzoo deal check it out while it last. We will be back when we visit universal studios Thanks for caring </DOC> Very friendly, clean and with helpful staff. A little noisy being along side one of the interstates but I am sure there are rooms that don't suffer from this. The pool and the bar were great. as was the restaurant for dinner and breakfast. We met an English couple on arrival who summary was that it just all worked and worked well. They have a free shuttle to the metro and universal. I really liked the ambiance and tranquility around the whole place. </DOC> My husband and I purchased a Groupon for a 2 night stay. Our plans were to lie by the pool and rest on a long weekend. Well, the pool was pretty tiny, so we didn't spend any time there, but otherwise we really enjoyed our stay. The decor is straight out of the 1970s, but in a good way! I really felt as though I was back in my parents' house in 1974. The service was great, although housekeeping didn't come until late in the afternoon. We would stay here again.
summary: Front desk staff was terrible, Rafi was very short in a disgusting attitude and then continued. Not there.
